title: Build
description:
This project is the refreshment of the visual identity of BUILD, a brand native to the Farcaster ecosystem. 

Conceived and built as an open system for the community where the remanence of a retro style based on repetition and error as a source of improvement inspired by the first operating systems of the 80‘s and 90’s is anchored as the core of the visual identity. It is also open source, as the philosophy of the BUILD ecosystem and the community is intended to be a Public Good. 

The new web page is an exercise of how the visual system can be transferred and applied to any digital product in a scalable way.
closingClaim: Design to bring more builders onchain

title: Node Terminal
description: NodeTerminal represents the perfect convergence of advanced technology and user-centered design. Through our design strategy, we have created more than just a platform; we have built a bridge to the future of digital finance, making the complex accessible and the innovative familiar.This project not only demonstrates our ability to address complex technological challenges, but also our commitment to creating experiences that truly matter and generate a positive impact on people's lives.
tagline: REDEFINING NODE INVESTMENT FOR THE MODERN ERA
closingClaim: Mapping the path of your investment
